alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Hamilton; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 9:53PM CDT until April 18 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... York County in east central Nebraska... Southeastern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Fillmore County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 953 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stockham to near Lushton to near Grafton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Henderson and Lushton around 1000 PM CDT. Fairmont and Hampton around 1005 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include McCool Junction, Bradshaw, York, Benedict and Waco. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 332 and 365. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
